summary: Energetic, motivated and organized sales representative with results in the oil and gas industry. Accomplished professional with strong background in technical sales and product development. Highlights Excellent communicator Excellent sales techniques Strategic account development Exceptional customer service skills Upselling and consultative selling Relationship selling Skilled multi-tasker Proven sales track record

experience.title: Business Development Manager
experience.description: Increased overall product line sales by 32% overall. Increased overall sales revenue at Weatherford and Baker Hughes by 40%. Responsible for sales within high temperature, high pressure applications. Secured sales contracts with Baker Hughes, Halliburton and Weatherford resulting in profit increasing by 21%.

experience.title: Global Sales Manager
experience.description: Created a strategic sales plan that allowed product development to increase in profit margins by more than 14%. Increased revenue by 20% within 1 year by building and strengthening relationships with existing customers. Established office in Calgary and defined territory. Effectively led Outside Sales team in Houston and Calgary.

experience.title: Technical Sales Representative / Key Account Team Leader
experience.description: Increase sales within my accounts by more than 200%. Developed and Managed the sales of a 9 million dollar account, the largest single account in the oilfield business group. Created and presented sales seminars outlining products and capabilities to Engineering, Manufacturing and Management supervisors.

experience.title: Business Development Manager/ Texas
experience.description: Developed and maintained accounts while growing overall sales revenue. Added new accounts that totaled over 1million dollars in new business. Ongoing testing of new elastomer compounds for ESP artificial lift clients. Sales presentations to pinpoint technical performance and benefits.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Communication Disorders
